question: A strength of mailing a survey is that ________.

answers.text: you are able to send it to all households in an area

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Mailed survey responses take more time to receive than other methods—there is a lag due to the survey being mailed out to potential respondents as well as the time it takes to have the completed survey sent back.
That’s not correct. Surveys that are sent through the mail are returned and then must be entered into a database through electronic or manual entry.

answers.text: responses are automatically loaded into the software

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Mailed surveys can be quite expensive to implement.
A mailed survey can be sent to all households easily through a postal service.

detailedSolution: A mailed survey can be sent to all households easily through a postal service.
